names.pinyin: shi guan ai er hao fang
names.english: formula number two for esophageal cancer
names.commonEnglish: Formula Number Two for Esophageal Cancer

actions: Resolves Phlegm Stagnation in the Lungs and descends Qi.
With Fu Hai Shi, for cough with viscous difficult-to-expectorate sputum and sensations of tightness in the chest due to Phlegm-Heat.
With Zhi Ban Xia, for vomiting, cough, wheezing and epigastric distention due to congested fluids.
Dries Dampness, transforms Phlegm, descends Rebellious Qi, dissipates nodules and reduces Stagnation.
Breaks up and drives out Blood Stasis and reduces fixed masses.
Attacks and relieves Fire toxins, relieves abdominal masses and dissipates nodules.
Clears Heat from the Lungs, transforms Phlegm, softens hardness and dissipates Phlegm nodules.
Calms the Liver, benefits Yin, anchors Floating Yang, softens hardness and
dissipates nodules.
Strengthens the Spleen, tonifies Qi and tonifies the Lungs.
Strongly reduces Food Stagnation, improves the Spleen's transportive function, transforms hardness and dissolves stones.
Reduces Food Stagnation, promotes digestion, strengthens and opens the Stomach,
harmonizes the Center, strengthens the Spleen and encourages appetite.
Reduces Food Stagnation, improves digestion, strengthens the Stomach and facilitates the smooth flow of Liver Qi.
With Gu Ya, restores normal appetite.
Stops cough, calms wheezing, descends Qi and dissolves Phlegm.
Clears Heat and transforms Hot Phlegm.
Clears Heat, relieves Fire toxicity, disperses swellings and improves the throat.
Invigorates and harmonizes the Blood, reduces swelling, expels pus, generates flesh and alleviates pain.
With Zhi Ban Xia and Zi Su Zi, for cough and wheezing due to Phlegm clogging the airways.
Clears Heat, resolves Fire toxins, invigorates the Blood, reduces swellings and treats various types of cancer and hepatitis.

syndromes: Esophageal cancer due to Liver Fire

symptoms: In severe cases: Mania Hemoptysis Hematemesis Epistaxis
